comments: All of those negative comments below must come from totally lazy dumb-asses. This is a college class, not the Tonight Show where you expect to be entertained.I found the class very rewarding. This professor is extremely well-prepared, and yes, soft-spoken. To do well, you have to study hard, that\'s it.

Condescending and boring. "Answers" questions with questions. Awful reading material assigned as though students have no other obligations or classes except hers. Tests are akin to a bad joke. Having a graduate degree doesn\'t mean one can or should be teaching. Effectively squashes any interest in IR/IC you have before taking her class. Stay away.

Cont Int\'l Conflict is the name of the course, but it\'s anything but that! It\'s true that she knows her African politics and conflicts, but THAT\'S IT! She has no knowledge of conflicts elsewhere in the world. Two tests of two essays each and one 7-10pg paper at the end.She\'s very nice, but she is too shy for the job.Her classes are pretty boring.

Terrible professor. Acts like a child trying to present in front of the class. The class was about international conflict and when a student asked "what\'s the u.s foreign policy," she did NOT KNOW THE ANSWER! More than half the class dropped her, including me. Reading material is boring and useless. She really should not be allowed to teach.
Yea if you are lazy dont take this class but if you wanna learn it is great. U have to read a lot but is interesting and she is really nice and helpful.

Boring Class, too much to read, too many assignmens and when somebody asks something, she asks back, instead of givin a clear answer, and spect u 2 do small definitions aut of those loooong readigs. Takes attendance every class

she moves her legs as a shy kid when has to talk in front of everybody, and the readings for every clas are very long, then you have to make a paper out of that reading. She do not speak fluently, she knows the subject, but do not know how to say it. The final paper is long too. So take her if u r just taking one class and have time for long readin

This professor behaves as a 5 year old kid when has to talk in front of everybody, plus is not clear what she says because is saying the same thing ten times and do not move forward. A loooooot of reading, and assignments. she should understand that we have other courses in which we have to read books too. The course requirements are too strict,
